Dec 7 (Reuters) - AVEVA Group PLC AVV.L:: *POWERRUNNER AND AVEVA SIGN RESELLER AGREEMENT TO PROVIDE REAL-TIME SITUATIONAL AWARENESS WITH ADVANCED METERING INFRASTRUCTURE-GRID ANALYTICS
